name: Mind HK: 精神健康急救證書課程（標準版）- 8 月 2 & 3 日 + 免費精神健康基礎培訓線上課程
location: Mind Hong Kong, 18B, One Capital Place, Mind HK, 18B, One Capital Place 18 Luard Road Wan Chai
about: 甚麼是精神健康急救？精神健康急救提供有關精神健康危機處理知識及技巧，讓一些正經歷精神健康問題或危機又尚未得到專業治療的人能得到適時幫助。此課程由受認可的專業人士教授，並設有角色扮演練習及小組討論環節。每位參加者可獲精神健康急救手冊（標準版）一套。出席率100%參加者可獲發精神健康急救課程（標準版）證書。課程內容包括：常見精神健康問題及相關危機情況的基本知識作為非專業人士可提供的幫助及何時需要向專業人士求助精神健康急救五項重點工作(ALGEE)作為精神健康急救員介入及處理緊急精神健康危機抑鬱症及自殺問題的急救處理焦慮問題及恐慌突襲的急救處理物質使用問題的急救處理重性精神病的急救處理協助當事人運用本地社區資源課程詳情：語言：廣東話日期：8 月 2 及 3 日時間：10:00 - 17:00時數：共12小時地點：香港心聆（灣仔盧押道18號海德中心18樓B室）報讀此課程前，我們建議參加者先完成我們的「精神健康基礎培訓線上課程」。報名此課程將獲贈免費參加 8 月 1 日 18:00-19:00 的「精神健康基礎培訓線上課程」。參加者將在此贈送課程開始前3天內收到課程 Zoom 連結。課程價格：標準門票：HKD 1,200資助門票：HKD 900（我們將不會提供發票，收據會在 Eventbrite 電郵中顯示）。合資格優惠門票：HKD 750（只適用於認可獲《稅務條例》第 88 條豁免繳稅的慈善機構的全職員工及全日制學生。請電郵至training@mind.org.hk並提供工作證明或全日制學生證之副本以獲取優惠碼。如有任何疑問，請電郵至training@mind.org.hk與我們聯絡）。證書安排：出席率100%的參加者可獲發精神健康急救課程（標準版）證書。登記詳情：請按此進行 Eventbrite 網上登記。請確保你的登記資料正確。我們會用你在Eventbrite輸入的登記資料印刷證書。課程開始後，我們將不接受任何更改。課程開始的一星期前，你可以在Eventbrite申請退款。此課程只適用於目前居住在香港的人士。參加者必須年滿18歲或以上。本課程名額有限，報名先到先得。我們會在未來提供更多精神健康課程。歡迎留意我們網站 www.mind.org.hk 及社交媒體以了解更多我們即將舉行的課程資訊。如有查詢，請電郵至 training@mind.org.hk 聯絡我們。

name: 好心程: 失業與就業困難
location: 16/f Chun Wo Commercial Centre, 23-27 Wing Wo Street Sheung Wan, HKI
about: 簡介：誠邀你加入我們，一起分享經歷、尋找慰藉，並集結團體的力量創造更共融的社會！關於活動：這個朋輩支援小組是為了支持你面對心理健康的挑戰。語言在溝通和分享中非常重要，而我們也知道在香港尋找心理支援和相關資源並不容易。因此，我們更堅信用廣東話來提供支援是非常重要。透過這個小組，我們希望能為你提供所需的支持和幫助！主題：朋輩支援：在一個包容、無批判的環境中，從容地分享個人故事、面對的挑戰，以及如何克服困難，並同時從他人的經歷中獲得啟發。社區共融：我們希望為你建立一個強大的支持網絡，讓你與志同道合的人連結和同行，擴展你的社交圈子，共同邁向前方的旅程。自我關懷：你可以學習有效的自我關懷方法，從他人的經驗中取經。適合人士：我們的免費支援小組歡迎任何正在尋找支持、理解和社群的廣東話人士。無論你是否面對心理健康的挑戰、經歷悲傷或失落，或者只是想提升自我關懷技巧，我們都歡迎你加入「好心程」的旅程！我們期待在「好心程」中與你相見！活動內容朋輩支援小組是參加者聚在一起，分享故事和互相支持的地方。小組將由兩位經過培訓的志願者主持，他們與你一樣，走過類似的心路歷程。第一次參加小組感到緊張是正常的，我們明白分享自己的故事需要勇氣。但請你相信，你值得得到別人的關心和支持，隨時加入我們，就算只是靜靜地聽也絕對歡迎。小組開始時，主持人會進行簡單介紹，然後邀請你自我介紹，邀請你分享你為什麼參加。之後，你不需要有壓力去發言，我們的主持人將會引導討論。在這裡，你可以：隨心分享故事，談談這些經歷如何影響你的生活真實地分享你的感受和情緒討論如何面對情緒健康的高低小組分享指引為了確保這個小組對每個人都包容，我們有一些基本的分享原則，希望大家遵守：保密性：小組的內容是保密的，請不要在外面討論具體細節，也不允許錄音。真誠分享：這裡是讓你誠實分享經驗的地方，沒有批評或對錯。自由發言：如果你不想發言，完全可以選擇靜靜地旁聽。專注傾聽：請給予說話者充分的注意，當有人分享時，其他人應該保持安靜。引導對話：如果主持人需要引導話題或掌控時間，請不要誤解我們在打斷你。彼此友善：對自己和他人要有善意。同理心：請用同情心來傾聽他人。尊重經驗：我們不會進行比較，每個人的經歷都值得尊重。請注意這個朋輩支援小組是讓大家分享個人困難和互相支持的地方。參加者可以來聆聽，但這不是觀察的空間。你應該來這裡參與朋輩支援，而不是作為學生進行研究、臨床人員觀察，或媒體報導，除非已獲得我們的書面同意。關於新常態慈善機構我們是香港S88註冊的慈善機構，於2022年開始在香港舉辦免費朋輩支援小組。這些小組由志願者主導。我們的主持人雖然經過培訓，但並不是心理健康專業人士。我們並不是為參加者提供建議，而是提供一個分享、連結和支持的空間。我們相信沒有人會感到孤單，總有他人能夠理解你的故事。如果你正處於情緒健康的危機中，無法保證自身安全，請尋求即時幫助：撒瑪利亞人：2341 7227（至晚上10時），2389 2222（全日）明愛：18288自殺預防熱線：23820000如想了解更多資訊，請查看我們的網站：www.thenewnormalcharityhk.org地點: 上環, 永和街23-29號, 俊和商業中心, 16樓 (上環地鐵站E2出口）從上環站步行約2分鐘：由E1出口出站後右轉，沿德輔道中直行。橫過永樂街後，於永和街（過馬路後第一條街）右轉。大樓位於左邊

name: Chakra Healing Sound Bath with Malbert Lee
location: Tune In Wellness, 16/F Simsons Commercial Building 137-139 Johnston Rd Wanchai, HKI
about: A unique deep relaxation and meditative experience with specially crafted Himalayan singing bowls and alchemy crystal singing bowls infused with gemstones, precious metals, minerals and crystals.Each week we will focus on different chakra.With specific meditation, essential oil application and singing bowl sound vibrations to promote circulation and energy flow.It includes a brief talk about the benefits of sound vibrations, special essential oils and gentle movement/meditation to improve the energy flow of the specific chakra, followed by a tranquil crystal soundscape immersion that gives you a sense of clarity and harmony.This nurturing experience will soothe your mind, relax your body, reduce stress, clear energetic blockage while being in a blissful altered state of consciousness so that you can feel good inside out.Simply wear anything comfortable. No experience is required.If there's any pre-existing medical condition please contact me before signing up.Chakra : Date7 Chakra: 6/24Root : 7/15Sacral : 7/29Solar Plexus : 8/12Heart : 8/26Throat : 9/9Third Eye : 9/23Crown : 10/14Ticket: $380 per person, $700 for two, $2400 for 7 sessions (There's a service charge if you book on Eventbrite), for other payment methods (Payme/FPS/Bank transfer) please email contact@tuneinwell.com to book

name: Return to Self - A breath + soul letter immersion
location: Yoga Journey Studio, 58 Wing Lok Street #10/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Return to Self is a 2-hour soul immersion designed to reconnect you with the truth beneath the performance — through breath, stillness, and words that were never spoken.You’ll be guided through:a third-person writing ritual to face the life you’re living and the one you’re called to claim. a Conscious Connected Breathwork practice to release, reset, and return to presence.This is for you if...You feel emotionally “off” but can’t name whyYou’ve been performing strength at the cost of softnessYou crave real stillness, real connection, and space to breathe againYou’re ready to feel without apologizing for itWhat to bring:watercomfortable clothing for lying down(Optional: Journal, blanket, eye mask, object of comfort)Please Note:This session involves deep emotional and somatic work.If you’re currently processing intense trauma, please reach out first so we can assess if this container is the right fit for you at this time.Reserve Your Spot NowTickets are non-refundable but transferable.Once your place is secured, you’ll receive a preparation email to support your journey in.You don’t need to be ready.You just need to be willing.This is your invitation to come home.

name: 初學者認證課程（1-3級）19&26/7 （兩日，共21小時）
location: Sound Healing HK 香港聲頻療癒, 46-48號 Hillwood Road #8樓807室 Tsim Sha Tsui, KOW
about: 🇳🇵 向香港唯一尼泊爾聲頻療癒大師學習🇳🇵 學習聲頻療癒 — 免費送你16–18cm 手工7金屬頌缽連木槌 + 墊 🎁（早鳥禮物）由 Akash 大師親自教授 — 尼泊爾第一間聲頻療癒學校創辦人，擁有19年教學經驗，全球已培訓超過5,000位療癒師。🪷 初級證書課程 – Level 1 至 3（兩日，共21小時 10:00 - 20:30)✅ 用真正7金屬頌缽，自然舒緩失眠、焦慮、壓力✅ 清理情緒阻塞，重整能量系統，每日感覺更輕鬆自在✅ 學識9種實用手法，配合1至7個頌缽 — 簡單、有力、即學即用🔹 非常適合：高壓上班族、身心靈愛好者，或想照顧自己健康嘅初學者🎁 早鳥限定優惠：以 HK$6,500（早鳥價）WhatsApp 👉🏻 wa.link/8w289t報名，即送你 16–18cm 手工7金屬頌缽連木槌 + 墊✔️ 課堂期間會用，課後可永久帶返屋企✔️ 數量有限，只限早報名者，送完即止🎓 完成課程後可獲三大國際認可證書：1️⃣ Natural Sound Healing International School（Level 1–3 證書）2️⃣ 國際治療師協會（IATOH）專業認證3️⃣ Yoga Alliance (YACEP) 持續進修證書📅 最新開班日期：19-20/6 ( 星期四/ 星期五) Master Akash14-15/6 (星期六/ 星期日) 中文班21-22/6 (星期六 /星期日) Master Akash12-13/7 (星期六 / 星期日) Master Akash14 -15/7 ( 星期一)19 & 26/7 (星期六) 中文班20/7 & 27/7 (星期日) Master Akash28-29/8 (星期四//星期五) Master Akash📲 立即 WhatsApp 我哋，解鎖早鳥禮物 & 預留你嘅位置！每班只限8人，小班教學，先到先得！WhatsApp 👉🏻 wa.link/8w289t （+852 9436 3664)Keep in Touch with us!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/singingbowlhk/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/singingbowlhk/Service Site: https://www.soundhealinghk.com/Product Site: https://himalayascrafthk.com/為什麼選擇我們的初級課程？我們的初學者認證課程是學習聲音治療的完美第一步。頌缽在印度、尼泊爾和西藏等地已使用了幾個世紀，現在在西方也很流行，它能發出與大自然節奏相符的深沉、平靜的聲音。無論您想治癒自己還是開始治癒他人，聲音療法都將有助於平衡身體的能量中心（脈輪）並緩解以下問題：消化問題頭痛和背痛病後恢復緩慢高血壓或低血壓睡眠問題壓力和情緒緊張精力不足，注意力不集中擁有超過 19 年的教學經驗和由 Akash 大師培訓的5,000 多名聲音治療師，您將向香港最好的聲音治療專家學習。到最後你將會知道什麼1) 聲頻療癒基礎2) 頌缽嘅歷史與種類3) 頌缽喺日常生活中嘅應用4) 點樣揀高品質嘅頌缽5) 配合使用其他聲音療癒樂器6) 脈輪與能量系統7) 經絡與聲頻療癒8) 淨化氣場技巧9) 腦波引導技術10) 頌缽嘅淨化與保養方法11) 實戰練習：9種技巧運用1至7個頌缽進行完整療癒

name: Summer Workshop - Kids Aerial Yoga with Cindy
location: The Yoga Room, 104 Jervois Street 4th Floor Hong Kong, HKI
about: Think your kid would love floating in the air? They totally will! This Kids Aerial Yoga Summer Workshop series involves using a soft fabric hammock or swing suspended from the ceiling to perform yoga poses, stretches, and gentle acrobatics.Dates: 21 July -29 Aug 2025, Every Monday & FridayTime: Monday 11am-12pm / Friday 3-4pmFee: HK300@class, HK250@class if you kid joins 5 sessions or aboveVenue: 3/F, The Yoga RoomPerfect for active kids who love to move—no experience needed!*Benefits of Aerial Yoga for Kids*1. *Improves Strength & Flexibility* – Kids develop core, arm, and leg strength while stretching their muscles safely.2. *Boosts Confidence* – Learning new poses and inversions helps build self-esteem.3. *Enhances Balance & Coordination* – The hammock challenges stability and spatial awareness.4. *Encourages Mindfulness & Relaxation* – Gentle swinging and deep breathing promote calmness.5. *Makes Fitness Fun* – It feels like playing while exercising!Enquiry and Sign Up: Please drop us an email at info@yogaroomhk.com / call 2544-8398 / WhatsApp +852 6685 9097 (Click to start chat) for details.

name: 「感同心受」- 免費同志/酷兒朋輩心理健康支援小組(廣東話)
location: Room XYZ, 4/F, Eaton Hotel, 380 Nathan Road Yau Ma Tei, KOW
about: 關於活動雖然香港有很多非異性戀的朋友，但當我們面對因性別或性取向帶來的情緒時，找到可以傾訴的人並不容易。為了支持這些LGBTQ+朋友的情感需求，新常態慈善機構特別設立了「感同心受」廣東話同志/酷兒朋輩心理健康支援小組。這個小組讓大家能夠與同樣經歷的人交流，互相理解和支持。無論你的性別、性傾向或性別表現如何，我們都歡迎你來分享或傾聽故事。我們的處境可能各有不同，但透過聆聽他人的故事，我們會發現自己並不孤單。活動內容 朋輩支援小組是參加者聚在一起，分享故事和互相支持的地方。小組將由兩位經過培訓的志願者主持，他們與你一樣，走過類似的心路歷程。第一次參加小組感到緊張是正常的，我們明白分享自己的故事需要勇氣。但請你相信，你值得得到別人的關心和支持，隨時加入我們，就算只是靜靜地聽也絕對歡迎。小組開始時，主持人會進行簡單介紹，然後邀請你自我介紹，邀請你分享你為什麼參加。之後，你不需要有壓力去發言，我們的主持人將會引導討論。在這裡，你可以：隨心分享故事，談談這些經歷如何影響你的生活真實地分享你的感受和情緒討論如何面對情緒健康的高低小組分享指引為了確保這個小組對每個人都包容，我們有一些基本的分享原則，希望大家遵守：保密性：小組的內容是保密的，請不要在外面討論具體細節，也不允許錄音。真誠分享：這裡是讓你誠實分享經驗的地方，沒有批評或對錯。自由發言：如果你不想發言，完全可以選擇靜靜地旁聽。專注傾聽：請給予說話者充分的注意，當有人分享時，其他人應該保持安靜。引導對話：如果主持人需要引導話題或掌控時間，請不要誤解我們在打斷你。彼此友善：對自己和他人要有善意。同理心：請用同情心來傾聽他人。尊重經驗：我們不會進行比較，每個人的經歷都值得尊重。請注意這個朋輩支援小組是讓大家分享個人困難和互相支持的地方。參加者可以來聆聽，但這不是觀察的空間。你應該來這裡參與朋輩支援，而不是作為學生進行研究、臨床人員觀察，或媒體報導，除非已獲得我們的書面同意。關於新常態慈善機構我們是香港S88註冊的慈善機構，於2022年開始在香港舉辦免費朋輩支援小組。這些小組由志願者主導。我們的主持人雖然經過培訓，但並不是心理健康專業人士。我們並不是為參加者提供建議，而是提供一個分享、連結和支持的空間。我們相信沒有人會感到孤單，總有他人能夠理解你的故事。如果你正處於情緒健康的危機中，無法保證自身安全，請尋求即時幫助：撒瑪利亞人：2341 7227（至晚上10時），2389 2222（全日）明愛：18288自殺預防熱線：23820000如想了解更多資訊，請查看我們的網站：www.thenewnormalcharityhk.org地點: 香港逸東酒店，XYZ房，4樓，彌敦道380號你可以參考呢條影片搵路: https://youtube.com/shorts/9TJ11fXBZU4?feature=share

name: Otherwise Employed
location: 16/f Chun Wo Commercial Centre, 23-27 Wing Wo Street Sheung Wan, HKI
about: What it isOtherwise Employed is a peer group for anyone who is unemployed or not working full time and finding it hard. Lots of things make being ‘Otherwise Employed’ hard. You might be in this position involuntarily, experiencing financial pressures, loss of identity, routine, or purpose, facing rejection in your job search, feeling lonely, or uncertain about the future.This is a forum for people to share the difficult emotions around not being in full-time employment, which provides not only income but also an identity, structure to your day, social contact, and often a purpose.What this is not- A forum to discuss the practicalities of job searches- A networking opportunityWhat happensA peer support group is where people come together to share personal stories, listen and support one another with kindness. You will be welcomed by two hosts who are trained TNN volunteers with lived experience in the topic of the group. It is normal to feel nervous, and sharing can be a big decision. Remember you are deserving of care and support. You are welcome to join us and just listen.Our hosts will welcome you and provide an introduction, then we will ask you to introduce yourself and your reason for joining us. From then on there is no pressure to speak. Our hosts will facilitate conversation.A peer support group is a supportive space where people can:Share stories and how our experiences are currently impacting our livesTalk about our feelings and emotionsShare and discuss coping strategiesGroup guidelinesWe have some basic guidance that we ask everyone to adhere to, to ensure this remains an inclusive space for everyone:Our groups are confidential; please don’t discuss specifics outside of the space, and no recording of the group is permitted.This is a space for you to share your experience honestly and without judgement or expectation.There is never any pressure to speak or share if you do not wish to. You are welcome to join and just listen. Please give the speaker our full attention: the person sharing should be the only one speaking. If the co-host or I step in to redirect the conversation either due to the interest of time or going off topic, we are not cutting you off. Please be kind to yourself and each other. Please listen with compassion. We do not compare here, everyone’s experience is valid and to be respected. Please noteAs a peer support group, this group is for peers to share their personal struggles and support one another. Attendees are welcome to come and listen but it is not a space to observe. You should attend to engage in peer support. It is not a space for students to contribute to their studies, for clinicians to observe, or for the press unless written agreement from the charity has been obtained.Who are The New Normal Charity?We are a Hong Kong S88 registered charity. The New Normal Hong Kong has been hosting our free peer support groups in Hong Kong since 2022. Our groups are facilitated by volunteers. While our hosts are trained to facilitate, we are not mental health professionals in this space. We do not give advice, we provide space for all of you to share, connect and support. Nobody should ever feel alone, and there is always somebody who can relate to your story.www.thenewnormalcharityhk.orgIf you are in crisis and don’t feel like you can keep yourself safe there are immediate services available. 危機求助熱線如果你覺得你不能保證自己的安全Samaritans 2341 7227 (until 10pm) 2389 2222 (24/7)Caritas 18288SPS Hotline 23820000AddressWYNG 16/F, Chun Wo Commercial Centre23-27 Wing Wo Street, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island How to get there2 minute walk from Sheung Wan Station:From Exit E1, turn right and walk along Des Voeux Rd Central. Cross Wing Lok Street, then turn right onto Wing Wo Street (the first street after you cross). The building will be on your left.

about: Unlock the Resilience Mastery Inside You with this High-Value Workshop by The International Resilience Institute Sydney (IRIS)We welcome you to a transformative learning experience with IRIS, where we know that resilience is not just a trait that some are born with; it's a skill to be honed and mastered...Our exclusive IRIS RESILIENCE FUNDAMENTALS workshop emerged from cutting-edge research, revealing two crucial insights:1. name: 200-hours Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.About the courseAnahata Yoga’s 200 Hours Teacher Training Certificate course gives yoga practitioners, enthusiasts, and aspiring instructors the chance to deepen their self-knowledge of yoga philosophy and improve on various aspects of their practice. It is an open-level training programme, suitable for those who have never done yoga before as well as those who have put in years of practice.Through the course, students gain a better understanding of yoga’s origins, history, as well as its philosophy. Students also learn how they may improve on their postures, that they may execute them with accuracy and, later, be able to demonstrate it to others.Why us?We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centres in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference.Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a programme is being offered.Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programmes give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

about: 【頌缽許願｜潛意識編程工作坊】—— 你的願望一直無法實現，不是因為不夠努力，而是潛意識在「自動導航」舊程式🔮 你是否有這些「潛意識卡點」？❌ 明明很想要，內心卻有個聲音說「我不配」❌ 設定了目標，卻總在最後關頭「自我破壞」❌ 理性知道該行動，但身體就是「動不起來」❌ 看過很多勵志書，但潛意識根本沒買單💡 這些，都是你的「潛意識原始碼」在作祟！大腦就像一台超級電腦，大部分行為由潛意識程式控制。如果底層程式寫著「我不值得成功」，再多的表面努力都會被抵消。🌌 這不是普通的「許願課」，而是一場「潛意識系統升級」，✨ 你將經歷的「潛意識重組過程」1️⃣ 【內在資源】深入潛意識提取珍貴內在資源；2️⃣ 【深度卸載】運用頌缽聲頻釋放負面能量及信念；3️⃣ 【新程式安裝】感官未來記憶植入▸ 不是「想像」成功，而是讓神經系統「體驗」已實現的狀態；4️⃣ 【防護機制】建立「信念防火牆」▸ 停止內耗，鍛煉抗逆能力「當你改變潛意識，世界會自動重組來匹配你的新版本。」💫 為什麼這方法有效？1. 繞過表層抵抗：頌缽聲頻快速進入潛意識2. 多重感官錨定：聲音+體感+催眠狀態3. 能量場共振：團體共同創造的場域加速效果【頌缽許願｜潛意識編程工作坊】📅 日期：7月31日(四)⏰ 時間：7:30-9:30pm📍 地點：尖沙咀諾士佛臺4-5號東港商業大廈13樓03室收費：$299🏷️【課程連報優惠】🧧現凡報2個或以上頌缽課程，均有優惠，詳情：https://www.facebook.com/share/r/19CMsSrvSg/【查詢及報名】WhatsApp: 63821806 (或Signal)可按 https://wa.me/85263821806FB: facebook.com/singingbowlhongkongIG: instagram.com/singingbowlhongkong～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～【 導師介紹：蘇德琪 Nickie So 】近年多次旅居尼泊爾，跟隨老師修練頌缽療癒，於奧修中心經歷21天的神秘玫瑰靜心，並學習不同的動態靜心。曾遠赴北京跟隨許明堂教授學習意象醫學，及到少林寺禪修一個月。也曾到南美經歷一整月的薩滿草藥療癒之旅。雖然多年前Nickie已是一名催眠治療師，可是她對身心靈整全療癒的追求，仍推動她旅居不同地方，向不同大師拜師學藝，繼續學習療癒自己療癒他人。資歷：Singing Bowl HK 創辦人能量頌缽療癒師課程系列導師、美國NGH催眠治療師及發證導師、奧修禪咭導師、靈性系統排列師、Registered Life Coach、Certified Developmental Coach、Master NLP Practitioner、象醫調理師、中國心理咨詢師(三級)、物理學碩士等曾帶領工作坊包括：- 頌缽系列：能量頌缽療癒師課程系列，經絡X頌缽課程，New/Full moon healing circle，Singing Bowl HK Healing Night，頌缽 X Orgonite 能量療癒，現代薩滿 X 聲音療癒夜，照顧者同樂日，七輪唱誦等；- 催眠系列：療癒內在小孩，愛與原諒，自我催眠提升運動效能，未來演練，前世回溯，飲食信念等- 奧修系列：Osho Active Meditation Series，奧修禪咭課程- 藝術相關：黑彩聲頻療癒夜，花藝X頌缽療癒，五味人生，禪食體驗等

name: 50 HR YIN YOGA TEACHER TRAINING 2025
dateTime: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart
location: The Yoga Room, 104 Jervois Street 4th Floor Hong Kong, HKI
about: 📌 Price: ⁠Level 1+2: HK$9,500 (Early-bird) HK$10,800 (Regular)Level 1: HK$ 6,300Level 2: HK$4,600📌 Dates:Level 1: 23-26 Aug, 2025 (Sat-Tue)Time: 8:30am-5pmLevel 2: 29-31 Aug 2025 (Fri-Sun)Time: 8:30am – 4:30pm (Friday & Saturday)Time: 8:30am – 3:30pm (Sunday)📌 Venue: The Yoga RoomLevel 1: (30 hours)Materials Covered:The YogaWise Yin Yoga Teacher Training (Level 1) is designed for students and teachers who wish to develop a deeper knowledge of this multifaceted yoga style, and emerge with a working definition and basic teaching methodology for Yin Yoga. There will be a strong emphasis on Anatomy, highlighting skeletal variations, the role of connective tissue, and the nervous system. An introduction to mindfulness meditation will address the non-physical nature of this profoundly quieting practice.Key Features of the YogaWise Yin Yoga Training (Level 1) include:What’s Your Style? Defining Yin Yoga as a Theory & PracticeDaoist perspective – Essence of Yin/Yang applied to Asana & AnatomyKey Yin Postures: Variations on a ShapeYintegration: Introducing Yin to Varied Student Populations”Assessment” Postures: Finding an Appropriate Edge for Different BodiesSpecific Highlights:Defining Target Areas: A Functional Approach to AsanaUnderstanding Soft-Tissue Tension vs. Structural CompressionWhat is Fascia? Exploring the Global Nature of the Extra-Cellular MaitrixSkeletal Variations: ”Asanalysis” of Our Unique BonesBeginner’s Mindfulness: Focusing Attention on PurposeLevel 2: (20 hours)Materials covered:The YogaWise Yin Yoga Teacher Training (Level 2) is designed for current Yin teachers or those already familiar with the basic orientation and language of Yin Yoga. This 20-Hour Level 2 course offers a closer examination of upper-body anatomy , and integrates the concept of myofascial meridians with practical sequencing strategies for both Yin and Yang classes. The course will also explore creative solutions and variations of Yin postures for students with limitations.Key Features of the YogaWise Yin Yoga Training (Level 2) include:Upper-Body Anatomy: Mapping the Shoulder GirdleWhat Limits Our Movement? Movement Tests for Shoulder GirdleTargeting Myofascial Tracks: From Mandalas to MeridiansPosture Orientation: Creative Solutions to Postural LimitationsMindfulness in Practice: Incorporating Meditation In YinSpecific Highlights:Introduction to Myofascial MeridiansYin + Yang Sequencing Themes: Stimulating the Myofascial TracksFunctional Anatomy for YinMapping the Shoulder Girdle: Identifying MyoFascial Groups”Asanalysis”: Tension vs. Compression at Shoulder GirdlePostural Variations:Change the Pose, not the Student: Working With Postural LimitationsMindfulness in Practice:Yin Yoga: Gateway to Meditation PracticeAbout David Kim:DAVID KIM (E-RYT500) is a U.S.-based international Senior Yoga Teacher Trainer, who teaches both Yin and Vinyasa (YogaWorks) styles, and has led numerous 200- and 300-Hour Teacher Trainings, workshops, and retreats across the globe. David’s passionate embrace of Yin Yoga owes a deep debt of gratitude to his mentors Paul & Suzee Grilley; to Sarah Powers’s meditative grace; to the cumulative wisdom of cutting-edge anatomy and movement teachers; and to the dedicated students who have accompanied him along this path towards personal and spiritual awareness.David is a registered Continuing Education provider with Yoga Alliance (USA), and taking this course will allow you to receive 20, 30 or 50 Hours of Continuing Education credit with YA.Enquiry and Sign Up: Please drop us an email at info@yogaroomhk.com / call 2544-8398 / WhatsApp +852 6685 9097 (Click to start chat) for details.

about: 🇳🇵 向香港唯一尼泊爾聲頻療癒大師學習🇳🇵 學習聲頻療癒 — 免費送你16–18cm 手工7金屬頌缽連木槌 + 墊 🎁（早鳥禮物）由 Akash 大師親自教授 — 尼泊爾第一間聲頻療癒學校創辦人，擁有19年教學經驗，全球已培訓超過5,000位療癒師。🪷 初級證書課程 – Level 1 至 3（兩日，共21小時 10:00 - 20:30)✅ 用真正7金屬頌缽，自然舒緩失眠、焦慮、壓力✅ 清理情緒阻塞，重整能量系統，每日感覺更輕鬆自在✅ 學識9種實用手法，配合1至7個頌缽 — 簡單、有力、即學即用🔹 非常適合：高壓上班族、身心靈愛好者，或想照顧自己健康嘅初學者🎁 早鳥限定優惠：以 HK$6,500（早鳥價）WhatsApp 👉🏻 wa.link/8w289t報名，即送你 16–18cm 手工7金屬頌缽連木槌 + 墊✔️ 課堂期間會用，課後可永久帶返屋企✔️ 數量有限，只限早報名者，送完即止🎓 完成課程後可獲三大國際認可證書：1️⃣ Natural Sound Healing International School（Level 1–3 證書）2️⃣ 國際治療師協會（IATOH）專業認證3️⃣ Yoga Alliance (YACEP) 持續進修證書📅 最新開班日期：19-20/6 ( 星期四/ 星期五) Master Akash14-15/6 (星期六/ 星期日) 中文班21-22/6 (星期六 /星期日) Master Akash12-13/7 (星期六 / 星期日) Master Akash14 -15/7 ( 星期一)19 & 26/7 (星期六) 中文班20/7 & 27/7 (星期日) Master Akash28-29/8 (星期四//星期五) Master Akash📲 立即 WhatsApp 我哋，解鎖早鳥禮物 & 預留你嘅位置！每班只限8人，小班教學，先到先得！WhatsApp 👉🏻 wa.link/8w289t （+852 9436 3664)Keep in Touch with us!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/singingbowlhk/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/singingbowlhk/Service Site: https://www.soundhealinghk.com/Product Site: https://himalayascrafthk.com/為什麼選擇我們的初級課程？我們的初學者認證課程是學習聲音治療的完美第一步。頌缽在印度、尼泊爾和西藏等地已使用了幾個世紀，現在在西方也很流行，它能發出與大自然節奏相符的深沉、平靜的聲音。無論您想治癒自己還是開始治癒他人，聲音療法都將有助於平衡身體的能量中心（脈輪）並緩解以下問題：消化問題頭痛和背痛病後恢復緩慢高血壓或低血壓睡眠問題壓力和情緒緊張精力不足，注意力不集中擁有超過 19 年的教學經驗和由 Akash 大師培訓的5,000 多名聲音治療師，您將向香港最好的聲音治療專家學習。到最後你將會知道什麼1) 聲頻療癒基礎2) 頌缽嘅歷史與種類3) 頌缽喺日常生活中嘅應用4) 點樣揀高品質嘅頌缽5) 配合使用其他聲音療癒樂器6) 脈輪與能量系統7) 經絡與聲頻療癒8) 淨化氣場技巧9) 腦波引導技術10) 頌缽嘅淨化與保養方法11) 實戰練習：9種技巧運用1至7個頌缽進行完整療癒

name: 100-hours Pranayama and Meditation Teacher Training Course
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.About the courseAnahata Yoga's 100 Hours Pranayama & Meditation Teacher Training Certificate Course gives yoga practitioners, enthusiasts, and aspiring instructors the chance to learn the art of mindfulness and mindful living. Through the course, students gain a better understanding of the basics of breathing, concentration and meditation techniques and how it influences the body and mind.Why us?We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centers in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference.Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a program is being offered.Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programs give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

name: 100-hours Kids Yoga Teacher Training (Saturday Morning and Afternoon)
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premier yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.What is kids yoga?Starting a yoga practice at a young age creates a healthy life for youngsters. By nature, children’s minds and bodies are flexible, adaptable and easily teachable. So long as yoga is fun, creative and interactive, it’s an activity they’re sure to like. In addition to being a great physical activity, yoga offers an entertaining way for children to learn about the mind and body, and their functions and abilities.Children also learn to balance their emotions and improve their focus and concentration through yoga. Various studies have shown that children who regularly practice yoga have better health and emotional balance, and are less likely to be afflicted with common health issues such as allergies, asthma, digestive disorders, obesity, ADD and ADHD.At Anahata Yoga, parents who enjoy yoga also pave the way for their children to enjoy the activity, making yoga a regular family activity and cultivating a healthy lifestyle. And just as yoga can be tailored according to the needs and capacities of every individual, so can kids’ yoga be designed to match the interests of every individual child – not only ensuring a healthy body and mind, but also some fun and laughter along the way.Benefits of yoga for kidsYoga helps improve strength and flexibility.Yoga increases concentration, focus, and attention.Kid’s yoga increases self – esteem.Yoga decreases anxiety and increases ability to relax.About Kids Yoga Teacher Training CourseAnahata Yoga’s Kids’ Yoga Teacher Training Course (100 hours) is one of the first accredited Certification Programme for Kid’s yoga in Hong Kong. Anahata Yoga offers a solid foundational grounding of yoga instruction and mindful yoga practices for children. Students learn the physiology and psychology of children of various age groups, and how to incorporate yoga to their leisure time as a hobby, a sport, and a discipline in a fun and creative way.“It takes a big heart to shape little minds,” it is said. At Anahata Yoga, students learn to teach kids’ yoga from the heart. At the end of our programme, students will be able to confidently teach yoga to children and design creative yoga classes for children of various age groups.The course is best suitedRegular Yoga practitioners to deepen your yoga knowledgeYoga instructorsSchool TeachersPhysical Education teachersPediatriciansPediatric Psychiatric Nurse PractitionersFor further details, please click the link below:https://anahatayoga.com.hk/training_workshop/100-hours-kids-yoga-teacher-training-saturday-morning-and-afternoon-2/

name: TNN YOGA - relaxing stretch & sound healing
location: The Yoga Lane, 27 High Street #B/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: So what is this yoga class?The class will focus on holding yoga poses mindfully for 2-5 minutes to allow participants to stretch out tired muscles and find a space to relax and restore without the hustle and bustle of the city noise. This class will be complemented with sound healing to help with further relaxation. We hope to hold space for participants to embark on an inward experience to release stress and find ease in the body and the mind. Suitable for all levels, with modifications and variations offered to accommodate all participants. Bilingual instructions will also be on offer.We aim to make fitness for mental health accessible in Hong Kong. That’s why we offer places in our classes for free for those experiencing financial hardship.Each TNN Yoga class costs $705HKD, $255 is an NGO discounted rental of the space and $450 goes to our amazing instructor(s) as we believe in fair pay.If you donate, you will be ‘paying it forward’ and providing a space in our next yoga class for someone facing financial hardship.We want everyone to have access to the support they need, regardless of their identity or circumstance.Please note we will be hosting our classes at Yoga Lane STUDIO 2 unless otherwise stated.Schedule for this series:29th May - Heinok & Valerie (sound healing)5th June - Heinok & Mina (movement)12th June - Heinok & Marcus (sound healing)19th June - Heinok26th June - Heinok & Christy (sound healing)3rd July - Heinok & Terence (Wall rope special)10th July - Heinok17th July - HeinokMove PartnersTaking part in physical activity can improve mental health in many ways; better sleep, happier moods, managing stress, anxiety, and intrusive thoughts, improved self-esteem, and connection to the community, to name a few.Move Partners is a collaborative project between The New Normal Charity and organisations, professionals, and athletes. We aim to reinforce the connection and the importance of moving to help support our mental health.So who are we?The New Normal CharityThe New Normal Charity is a Hong Kong registered S88 charity 91/19147. We offer free peer support groups for mental health. We aim to help and support one another through life's difficult moments. We want everyone to have access to the support they need, regardless of their identity or circumstance. We empower people with lived mental health experiences.We support people living in Hong Kong struggling to access the mental health support they need. Because no one should have to face mental pain alone.HeinokHeinok (she/her) is a yoga instructor, singing bowl sound healer and TNN HK volunteer. She’s a RYT-200 yoga instructor with additional training in yin yoga, making yoga accessible and singing bowl sound healing level 1. As a healthcare professional who strongly believes in equality, she is passionate about wellness and accessibility concepts. Thus, you will find her teaching with a lot of anatomical cues and modifications as she leads you through her carefully curated functional flows. Tied with her passion for mental health empowerment and advocacy, her life goal of sharing with people that ‘movement is a form of medicine’.

name: 「好心程」 - 免費心理健康朋輩支援小組(廣東話)
location: D'hub (太子地鐵站 D 出口，行1分鐘就到), Unit 14BC, HQ,) 450-454 Portland Street Prince Edward, KOW
about: 簡介：誠邀你加入我們，一起分享經歷、尋找慰藉，並集結團體的力量創造更共融的社會！關於活動：這個朋輩支援小組是為了支持你面對心理健康的挑戰。語言在溝通和分享中非常重要，而我們也知道在香港尋找心理支援和相關資源並不容易。因此，我們更堅信用廣東話來提供支援是非常重要。透過這個小組，我們希望能為你提供所需的支持和幫助！主題：朋輩支援：在一個包容、無批判的環境中，從容地分享個人故事、面對的挑戰，以及如何克服困難，並同時從他人的經歷中獲得啟發。社區共融：我們希望為你建立一個強大的支持網絡，讓你與志同道合的人連結和同行，擴展你的社交圈子，共同邁向前方的旅程。自我關懷：你可以學習有效的自我關懷方法，從他人的經驗中取經。適合人士：我們的免費支援小組歡迎任何正在尋找支持、理解和社群的廣東話人士。無論你是否面對心理健康的挑戰、經歷悲傷或失落，或者只是想提升自我關懷技巧，我們都歡迎你加入「好心程」的旅程！我們期待在「好心程」中與你相見！活動內容朋輩支援小組是參加者聚在一起，分享故事和互相支持的地方。小組將由兩位經過培訓的志願者主持，他們與你一樣，走過類似的心路歷程。第一次參加小組感到緊張是正常的，我們明白分享自己的故事需要勇氣。但請你相信，你值得得到別人的關心和支持，隨時加入我們，就算只是靜靜地聽也絕對歡迎。小組開始時，主持人會進行簡單介紹，然後邀請你自我介紹，邀請你分享你為什麼參加。之後，你不需要有壓力去發言，我們的主持人將會引導討論。在這裡，你可以：隨心分享故事，談談這些經歷如何影響你的生活真實地分享你的感受和情緒討論如何面對情緒健康的高低小組分享指引為了確保這個小組對每個人都包容，我們有一些基本的分享原則，希望大家遵守：保密性：小組的內容是保密的，請不要在外面討論具體細節，也不允許錄音。真誠分享：這裡是讓你誠實分享經驗的地方，沒有批評或對錯。自由發言：如果你不想發言，完全可以選擇靜靜地旁聽。專注傾聽：請給予說話者充分的注意，當有人分享時，其他人應該保持安靜。引導對話：如果主持人需要引導話題或掌控時間，請不要誤解我們在打斷你。彼此友善：對自己和他人要有善意。同理心：請用同情心來傾聽他人。尊重經驗：我們不會進行比較，每個人的經歷都值得尊重。請注意這個朋輩支援小組是讓大家分享個人困難和互相支持的地方。參加者可以來聆聽，但這不是觀察的空間。你應該來這裡參與朋輩支援，而不是作為學生進行研究、臨床人員觀察，或媒體報導，除非已獲得我們的書面同意。關於新常態慈善機構我們是香港S88註冊的慈善機構，於2022年開始在香港舉辦免費朋輩支援小組。這些小組由志願者主導。我們的主持人雖然經過培訓，但並不是心理健康專業人士。我們並不是為參加者提供建議，而是提供一個分享、連結和支持的空間。我們相信沒有人會感到孤單，總有他人能夠理解你的故事。如果你正處於情緒健康的危機中，無法保證自身安全，請尋求即時幫助：撒瑪利亞人：2341 7227（至晚上10時），2389 2222（全日）明愛：18288自殺預防熱線：23820000如想了解更多資訊，請查看我們的網站：www.thenewnormalcharityhk.org太子站步行約1分鐘：從D出口出站後向右轉，沿砵蘭街直行，大樓位於右邊。HQ 九龍油尖旺太子砵蘭街450-454號 HQ大廈14樓B C室 D’hub

name: 100-hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.About the courseAnahata Yoga’s Accredited 100 hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Course (RPYT) is a comprehensive prenatal yoga certification program designed to equip aspiring yoga instructors with a strong foundational knowledge of physiology and anatomy in pregnancy. Students of the course will learn to support women in every stage of pregnancy, through delivery, and even into the early days of motherhood.The 100 hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Course is a specialized program for yoga practitioners aspiring to teach yoga to pregnant women. Students are taught how various yogic practices are adapted and modified during various stages of pregnancy and early motherhood. Highly qualified and experienced instructors will teach the physical and mental changes that occur normally in a pregnant body, and how yoga can help promote a smooth pregnancy.At the end of this course, students will be able to deliver specific pre- and post-natal classes for pregnant women.The course is best suitedRegular Yoga practitioners to deepen your yoga knowledgeYoga instructorsFitness trainersPhysiotherapist,Antenatal trainersMassage TherapistEven If you're pregnant and looking for ways to relax or stay fit, you may consider joining our prenatal yoga program.What to expect:Practical tools for teaching a safe and comprehensive prenatal yoga class.A thorough understanding of yoga and its application in various pregnancy-related physical and mental conditions.Learn how to tailor make a sequence for various stages of pregnancy and how to adapt the poses for each individual as per the daily needs and limits.Practice the poses with a dummy pregnant belly to experience the real challenges of the pregnant women during the class.Study materials (provided):Prenatal Yoga sequence PosterPrenatal Yoga Practice ManualWhy us?We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centers in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference.Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a program is being offered.Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programs give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

name: 100-hours Kids Yoga Teacher Training
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Kids YogaWho we areAnahata Yoga is a premier yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.What is kids yoga?Starting a yoga practice at a young age creates a healthy life for youngsters. By nature, children’s minds and bodies are flexible, adaptable and easily teachable. So long as yoga is fun, creative and interactive, it’s an activity they’re sure to like. In addition to being a great physical activity, yoga offers an entertaining way for children to learn about the mind and body, and their functions and abilities.Children also learn to balance their emotions and improve their focus and concentration through yoga. Various studies have shown that children who regularly practice yoga have better health and emotional balance, and are less likely to be afflicted with common health issues such as allergies, asthma, digestive disorders, obesity, ADD and ADHD.At Anahata Yoga, parents who enjoy yoga also pave the way for their children to enjoy the activity, making yoga a regular family activity and cultivating a healthy lifestyle. And just as yoga can be tailored according to the needs and capacities of every individual, so can kids’ yoga be designed to match the interests of every individual child – not only ensuring a healthy body and mind, but also some fun and laughter along the way.About Kids Yoga Teacher Training CourseAnahata Yoga’s Kids’ Yoga Teacher Training Course (100 hours) is one of the first accredited Certification Program for Kid’s yoga in Hong Kong. Anahata Yoga offers a solid foundational grounding of yoga instruction and mindful yoga practices for children. Students learn the physiology and psychology of children of various age groups, and how to incorporate yoga to their leisure time as a hobby, a sport, and a discipline in a fun and creative way.“It takes a big heart to shape little minds,” it is said. At Anahata Yoga, students learn to teach kids’ yoga from the heart. At the end of our programme, students will be able to confidently teach yoga to children and design creative yoga classes for children of various age groups.For further details, please click the link below:https://anahatayoga.com.hk/training_workshop/100-hours-kids-yoga-teacher-training-mon-wed-evening/

name: 100-hours Inversion Teacher Training Certificate Course
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.About Anahata Yoga Accredited “100hrs Inverse Yoga Teacher Training Course”Anahata Yoga’s accredited Inversion Yoga Teacher Training is designed with the developmental needs of our students at the centre – learning to understand the physical and mental challenges of the inversion poses and how to appropriately teach these poses safely is fundamental to a yoga teacher’s skill set. The core of our teacher training program is to provide our students with the knowledge and skill to enable them to then teach inversion poses with awareness for the unique anatomy and physiology needs of their students. Also, to skill them with a wide variety of methods and tools to tailor their teaching appropriately and with confidence.Our faculty of teachers who are teaching this inversion teacher training are from the Andiappan yoga tradition. They have embedded yoga into their daily lifestyle and understand the importance of teaching the foundation yogic practices in a manner that enables the students to build a strong foundation for a lifelong yoga journey.All of our teachers have substantial experience as yoga teachers and in teaching inversion and inversion-themed classes, workshops, private classes – they all have extensive experience in transforming students’ practices and capabilities, to levels where the students can practice basic to advanced postures with confidence and in a safe manner without fear for risk of injury.

name: 300-hours Advanced Hatha Yoga Teacher Training Course Level 1 – Level 3
location: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F Hong Kong, HKI
about: Who we areAnahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga.As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle.About Advanced Hatha Yoga Teacher TrainingThe Level 1,2 Advanced Hatha Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course is for yoga practitioners interested in growing their knowledge of Hatha yoga and developing their techniques in executing various Hatha yoga poses. The course is divided into 3 levels, each of which focuses on basic and intermediate poses, their possible modifications and variations, and teaching and demonstration techniques.The aim of the course is to challenge practitioners to advance in their practice by exploring the limits of their body and overcoming them, as well as to develop their knowledge of the body in order to better understand every joint and muscle nuance in the poses. By the end of the course, participants shall be able to demonstrate the wide range of Hatha yoga poses, explain their possible modifications and variations, and demonstrate the steps required to achieve the pose.What do I learn from each level?Levels 1 and 2 of the course are of the same level of intensity but focus on different practical and teaching aspects of advanced practices hatha yoga.Level 1 covers Introduction of Hatha yoga, its origins, the basic anatomical details of the poses and its various approaches from the beginner's point of view. Proper Warm-up and preparatory practices are covered in detail.Level 2, on the other hand, covers other variations of the poses with deeper learning and practice. The student will get to practice many variations and modifications of the poses and learn how to modify as per their limitations.Level 3, students learn the teaching techniques of postures taught in the first two levels, as well as Partner Yoga variations, usage of straps, Chair Yoga, and the art of demonstration.Students also learn to sequence poses, teach the advanced Hatha yoga classes, and develop a class theme that focuses on various levels.As the final level in this series of training, Level 3 prepares students as Advanced Hatha Yoga Teachers.You can first take levels 1 & 2 and then the teacher will decide whether you are ready for level 3, after the completion of level 2 this time or wait for next time. Usually, we will have two advanced YTT in a year.This course is best suited forRegular Yoga PractitionersStudentsYoga TeachersFitness TrainersPilates TrainersSports playersWhy us?We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. name: UNHEARD 2025: Singing Bowl Session - Tuning the Mind, Healing the Body
location: Kino, Eaton House (Co-working), 380 Nathan Road 1/F Hong Kong, KOW
about: Reserve spot at the following link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd6Eac724J0yIOOs2qRryfTorMGgEFB95eMNlVCGWdpC-cMSg/viewform?usp=headerTicket price: HKD$480 for 1 ppl + 1 pet (to be paid on arrival)_______________________________Shoji presents a singing bowl session for dogs and their owners on 27/7Singing bowl sound healing is a therapeutic practice that utilizes the resonant tones and vibrations produced by singing bowls—often made of metal or crystal. These bowls are played by striking or rubbing the rim with a mallet, creating harmonic sounds that promote relaxation and mindfulness. The sound waves produced can help to balance energy, reduce stress, and facilitate a meditative state. This ancient practice is rooted in various spiritual traditions and is gaining popularity in modern wellness for its ability to enhance emotional and physical well-being.- Calming Effect: The soothing tones of singing bowls can create a calming environment that helps reduce anxiety for both dogs and their owners, making it a perfect tool for relaxation.- Bonding Experience: Participating in sound healing sessions together can strengthen the bond between dogs and their owners, promoting feelings of safety and trust.- Stress Relief: Just as humans experience stress, pets can also feel anxious. The gentle sounds can help alleviate stress in dogs, making them more relaxed and at ease.- Enhanced Well-Being: Sound healing can promote physical and emotional well-being for both dogs and their masters, contributing to a healthier lifestyle and better quality of life.- Positive Environment: The vibrations and sounds can create a positive atmosphere that encourages playfulness and joy, benefiting the overall mood of the household.Overall, sound healing fosters a peaceful space that nurtures the connection between humans and their canine companions.在以下鏈接預約位置： https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd6Eac724J0yIOOs2qRryfTorMGgEFB95eMNlVCGWdpC-cMSg/viewform?usp=header票價：HKD$480，包含1人 + 1隻寵物（到達時支付）_______________________________Shoji 將於 7 月 27 日為狗狗及其主人呈現一場頌缽音療約會。頌缽音療是一種治療性實踐，利用頌缽產生的共鳴音調和振動，這些頌缽通常由金屬或水晶製成。頌缽通過用槌子敲擊或摩擦邊緣來演奏，產生和諧的聲音，促進放鬆和正念。所產生的聲波可以幫助平衡能量、減少壓力並促進冥想狀態。這種古老的實踐根植於各種靈性傳統中，並因其增強情感和身體健康的能力而在現代健康領域中越來越受歡迎。鎮靜效果：頌缽的舒緩音調可以創造一個平靜的環境，有助於減少狗狗和主人之間的焦慮，成為放鬆的完美工具。增強聯繫：共同參加音療會可以加強狗狗和主人之間的聯繫，促進安全感和信任感。減壓：和人類一樣，寵物也會感到焦慮。柔和的聲音可以幫助減輕狗狗的壓力，使它們更加放鬆和自在。提升福祉：音療可以促進狗狗和主人的身體和情感健康，有助於更健康的生活方式和更好的生活質量。積極環境：振動和聲音可以創造一種積極的氛圍，鼓勵玩耍和快樂，造福整個家庭的心情。總括而言，音療促進了一個和平的空間，培養人類與其犬類伴侶之間的聯繫。

name: Biomagnetism Vitality 磁能學速成學習班 19.0
location: Car Po Commercial Building, 18-20 Lyndhurst Terrace Rm1705 Central, HKI
about: Speaker and Therapist 主講者及生物磁能學師: Samuel SitWelcome to the course on Biomagnetic Vitality, where you will explore the mysteries and benefits of biomagnetism. This natural therapy uses the body's electromagnetic fields to improve health by balancing pH levels and promoting holistic healing. In this course, you’ll discover the principles of biomagnetic therapy and how it can enhance your overall well-being.歡迎來到生物磁能學課程，在這裡您將探索生物磁能學的奧秘與益處。這種自然療法利用人體的電磁場來改善健康，通過平衡酸鹼值促進整體療癒。在本課程中，您將了解生物磁療法的原理以及它如何增進整體健康。A new mindset for health - Biomagnetism Vitality involves “Empowering Vitality”, “Self-Healing”, and “Regain health without relying on medication”.健康的新思維 - 生物磁能學的新思維, 是提升個人活力及”自癒能力”, 最終賦予健康而不依靠藥物。Click for details at Https://posshealth.hkAll topics in brief will be lectured in detail with demonstration.課程是簡單而全面性, 並會手把手教授基本技術With the knowledge and experience of Mr. Samuel Sit, who will tutor the theory and practice, with categories including:1, Benefits of Biomagnetism 生物磁能的好處2, Biomagnetism can reduce inflammation & help with Pain 生物磁能減緩炎症, 對疼痛有幫助3, Practice & Session 實踐課程The study of Biomagnetism Vitality is founded with the purpose of “Teaching people to fish rather than giving them fish”. It is suitable for anyone willing to learn, regardless of age, gender, education, or religion. The unique method of Biomagnetism Vitality is to activate vitality and improve health for oneself and others, reducing reliance on medication. With long-term learning, diligent practice, and application of knowledge to help oneself and others, one can achieve unlimited possibilities. The goal is to pass on the knowledge with legacy, sincerity, and the spirit of promotion, and ensure to carry it forward forever創立了生物磁能學, 目的是”授人以魚不如授人以漁”, 任何有志學習者, 不分年齡, 不分男女, 不分學歷, 不分宗教, 均適宜學習。生物磁能學獨特的開啟活力的方法, 無論為自己, 為他人, 都能提升活力及健康, 為人們減少依賴藥物。長期學習, 勤加練習, 利用所學, 助人助己, 最終將無限可能, 秉誠傳承, 廣傳所學, 發揚光大。Friendly Reminder: Please equip yourself with a pen & notebook.溫馨提示: 請自備紙筆作記錄。A Certificate of Completion will be provided to those who attend all classes without absence & pass the test. (The certificate fee is HK$100)參加課程者, 需上完所有課堂,及測試考核, 將授于磁療學速成班證書. (証書費用為港幣100元)Complete the Biomagnetism Vitality Crash Course and obtain a certificate before proceeding to the learning courses of L1, L2, and Advanced Level.Certificate of CompletionWhy a certificate of completion is so important after attending the Crash Course because it is accredited that one is entitled to a promotion to further study ofLevel 1, Level 2, & Advanced Level, ultimately upgrade to be a successful career.為什麼速成課程後需要結業証書呢? 因為該証書是認可您, 將可進修Level 1, Level 2, 和 Advanced Level, 而完成整個課程, 令您成功進入新事業生涯WhatsApp: 852-97451018

name: Summer Nights @ Shaw Auditorium: Robot Dreams
location: Main Hall, Shaw Auditorium, HKUST HONG KONG, NT
about: 逸夫演藝中心誠邀您參加盛夏電影放映活動，一同欣賞溫馨感人的動畫電影《汪汪夢裡人》。本片以狗狗與機器人之間的深厚友情為主題，透過精緻的動畫畫面與電影歌曲，細膩描繪孤獨、夢想與現實交織的情感旅程。全片無對白，但每個動作與表情都勝過千言萬語。這將是一場讓您放鬆心情、感受真摯情感的觀影體驗，誠邀您蒞臨共度美好時光！Shaw Auditorium cordially invites you to a summer film screening featuring the heartwarming animated film "Robot Dreams." This touching story showcases the profound friendship between a dog and a robot, brought to life through exquisite animation and music. With no dialogue, the film conveys deep emotions through gestures and expressions. Join us for this captivating cinematic experience that promises to soothe your mind and touch your heart!故事簡介榮獲奧斯卡最佳動畫長片提名，感動橫掃全球60+項大獎及提名，被譽為媲美《優獸大都會》及《星聲夢裡人》的年度最佳電影！單身狗狗厭倦了寂寞的獨居生活，決定購買智能機械人作伴。二人一拍即合，日夜漫遊紐約大街小巷。正當他們以為找到人生中的彼此，命運卻在一次沙灘狂歡後將他們硬生生拆散。狗狗帶著思念回復孤獨的生活日常，機械人則獨自躺在沙灘上幻想著再次回到狗狗身邊……在這場無盡的思念旅程中，有沒有一個重來的機會？SynopsisBased on a graphic novel by Sara Varon, Goya-Award-winning director Pablo Berger’s first venture into animation is a colourful, vibrant and touching buddy drama. To escape solitude, Dog assembles Robot from a build-it-yourself kit. Setting off on a whimsical exploration of New York City, the new best friends develop an inseparable bond as they savour curbside hotdogs and roller-skate through Central Park. However, their friendship is abruptly brought to a halt when an accident leaves Robot stranded on a beach.備註 Remarks:本次放映之影片不設對白。 No Dialogue.電影全長103分鐘。Film Duration: 103 minutes.電影級別: I (適合任何年齡人士觀看)。Film Classification: I (Suitable for All Ages).免費入場，請預先網上報名。 Free admission. Online registration is required.請於放映前15分鐘抵達場地。 Please arrive at the venue 15 minutes before the screening.入場守則 Admission Rules:不設劃位，先到先得。Free-seating on first-come-first-served basis.場內嚴禁飲食。No food and drinks are allowed in the venue.未經許可，請勿攝影、錄音或錄影。Unauthorized photo-taking, audio or video recording is strictly prohibited.主辦單位保留更改節目、演出者及座位安排的權利。如有任何爭議，主辦單位保留最終決定權。The organizer reserves the right to make changes to the program, performers and seating arrangement. In case of dispute, the decision of the organizer shall be final.
